title: `ApplicationTests::RackTests::LoggerTest` raises DEPRECATION WARNING: `raise_on_open_redirects` is deprecated
body:
Managed to reproduce CI failures / warnings since https://github.com/rails/rails/pull/55496

https://buildkite.com/rails/rails-nightly/builds/2894#019982ae-125a-49f7-9161-b63326414244/1565-1577
https://buildkite.com/rails/rails/builds/122053#019981b0-c6be-4326-aefc-ca62408426e1/1281-1287

### Steps to reproduce

```ruby
git clone https://github.com/rails/rails
cd rails/railties
bin/test test/application/rack/logger_test.rb 
```

### Expected behavior
It should pass without warnings.

### Actual behavior

```ruby
$ bin/test test/application/rack/logger_test.rb 
Run options: --seed 62846

# Running:

DEPRECATION WARNING: `raise_on_open_redirects` is deprecated and will be removed in a future Rails version. Use `config.action_controller.action_on_open_redirect = :raise` instead. (called from Module#class_eval at /home/yahonda/src/github.com/rails/rails/activesupport/lib/active_support/lazy_load_hooks.rb:97)
DEPRECATION WARNING: `raise_on_open_redirects` is deprecated and will be removed in a future Rails version. Use `config.action_controller.action_on_open_redirect = :raise` instead. (called from Module#class_eval at /home/yahonda/src/github.com/rails/rails/activesupport/lib/active_support/lazy_load_hooks.rb:97)
DEPRECATION WARNING: `raise_on_open_redirects` is deprecated and will be removed in a future Rails version. Use `config.action_controller.action_on_open_redirect = :raise` instead. (called from Module#class_eval at /home/yahonda/src/github.com/rails/rails/activesupport/lib/active_support/lazy_load_hooks.rb:97)
.DEPRECATION WARNING: `raise_on_open_redirects` is deprecated and will be removed in a future Rails version. Use `config.action_controller.action_on_open_redirect = :raise` instead. (called from Module#class_eval at /home/yahonda/src/github.com/rails/rails/activesupport/lib/active_support/lazy_load_hooks.rb:97)
....

Finished in 0.670310s, 7.4592 runs/s, 14.9185 assertions/s.
5 runs, 10 assertions, 0 failures, 0 errors, 0 skips
$
``` 

### System configuration

**Rails version**:  main branch

**Ruby version**:  ruby 3.4.6 (2025-09-16 revision dbd83256b1) +PRISM [x86_64-linux]
